components/wbcomponents/category/sidebar:
<nav>

    {{#if categories}}
        {{> components/wbcomponents/addons/category }}
    {{/if}}

    {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}}
        {{> components/faceted-search/index category}}
    {{else}}
        {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}}
    {{/if}}

	{{> components/wbcomponents/addons/wb_extraslider/default status=true products= products.top_sellers productType="top_sellers"  row=5 columns=1  class_sfx="wb-extraslider--sidebar" }}

	{{> components/wbcomponents/addons/wb_banner/banner status=true prefix="cmsblock" showContent=true limitation=1 display_mode="" class_sfx=""}}


</nav>
components/wbcomponents/addons/category:
{{lang 'category.label'}}
    {{#each categories}}
  • {{#if children}} {{name}}
      {{#each children}}
    • {{#if children}} {{name}}
        {{#each children}}
      • {{name}}
        • {{/each}}
      {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}
      • {{/each}}
    {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets selected}} {{#if facets.length '>' 2}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' limit=2}} & {{toLowerCase (lang 'search.faceted.more')}} {{else}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' lastSeparator=' & '}} {{/if}} {{lang 'search.faceted.hide-filters'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-filters'}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/wbcomponents/addons/wb_extras:
{{#forEach products }} {{#if row '==' 1}}
{{> components/wbcomponents/products/card_row theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer settings=../settings}}
{{else}} {{#or isFirst (if index '===' (add 1 ../row)) (if index '===' (add 1 (multiply 2 ../row))) (if index '===' (add 1 (multiply 3 ../row))) (if index '===' (add 1 (multiply 4 ../row))) }}
{{/or}} {{> components/wbcomponents/products/card_row theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer settings=../settings show_rating=../settings.show_product_rating}} {{#or (if index '===' ../row)(if index '==='(multiply 2 ../row)) (if index '==='(multiply 3 ../row)) (if index '==='(multiply 4 ../row)) (if index '===' total)}}
{{/or}} {{/if}} {{/forEach}}

{{#if icon '!=' ' '}} {{else}}
{{#if image '!=' ' '}} {{> components/common/responsive-img class="img-fluid" image=(cdn image) fallback_size=theme_settings.blog_size lazyload='lazyload' }} {{else}} {{/if}}
{{/if}} {{#if show_content}}
{{#if title '!=' ' '}}
{{title}}
{{/if}} {{#if text '!=' ' '}}
{{{text}}}
{{/if}} {{#if button '!=' ' '}} {{button}} {{/if}}
{{/if}}

{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}

{{#if items}}
    {{#each items}}

components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:

components/wbcomponents/products/card_ro:
{{#or price.non_sale_price_with_tax price.non_sale_price_without_tax}} {{#if theme_settings.product_sale_badges '===' 'sash'}}
{{lang 'wbTheme.categories.sale_badge_text'}}
{{else if theme_settings.product_sale_badges '===' 'topleft'}}
{{lang 'wbTheme.categories.sale_badge_text'}}
{{else if theme_settings.product_sale_badges '===' 'discount'}} {{#if price.with_tax}} {{#if price.non_sale_price_with_tax}} {{> components/wbcomponents/products/discount discounts = (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value price.with_tax.value ) price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value) 100)}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if price.without_tax}} {{> components/wbcomponents/products/discount discounts = (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value price.without_tax.value ) price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value ) 100)}} {{/if}} {{else if theme_settings.product_sale_badges '===' 'burst'}}
{{lang 'wbTheme.categories.sale_badge_text'}}
{{/if}} {{/or}}
{{> components/common/responsive-img image=image class="card-image" fallback_size=theme_settings.thumb_size lazyload=theme_settings.lazyload_mode default_image=theme_settings.default_image_product }}

{{name}}

{{#if brand.name}}

{{brand.name}}

{{/if}} {{#if show_rating}}
{{> components/products/ratings rating=rating}}
{{/if}}
{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
{{> components/products/bulk-discount-rates}}
components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}
components/faceted-search/faceted-search: {{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
components/products/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
